item.description:
Taste of Hartford week, let's go to O'PORTO restaurant August 4th at 7:00pm. Menu for $20.10 is found on their website - click here: http://www.oportohart...

It's been a while since we've done this place. Parking is to the side and all the way to the back (behind Tinkers).

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 1:00pm the day before if need be.

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: O'PORTO 8/4/10 7:00pm
